title: Shadow Negotiations Exposed
outcome: Amid chaos as returnees face new detentions and protests intensify, Innovators and Directorate orchestrate secret reconciliation sessions. Returnees help draft public statements, but manipulative policies disguised as reform are leaked, fueling deeper distrust and new protest waves.

events.description: Innovators and Directorate secretly bring returned citizens to closed-door sessions to draft 'reconciliation' statements.
Manipulative language legitimizing prior detainments is inserted into the new council policy by Directorate loyalists.
Leaked drafts of the 'reconciliation' statements circulate via analog channels, revealing underlying deceit and manipulation.
Protests reignite across the city, driven by outrage at the Council's duplicity and the exploitation of returnees.
